description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2v645","text":"Standard of procedure for cryomiller Retsch at the Soft Materials Laboratory (EPFL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"22aho","text":"Use two wrenches to unscrew the N2 pipe from the dewar. Firmly push downwards both wrenches at the same time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eksq2","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7drgp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"093D5E70F0BF11ED9A02C101C16BC79B","height":412,"id":378633,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"2vt78\",\"text\":\"Unscrew the N2 line from the dewar.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Asset 1.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2mb3twp.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2jb3twp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2kb3twp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2ib3twp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7gn8h","text":"Place the dewar in the lift and block the wheels. Pull the red strap in front of the door of the lift and send the lift to floor 0. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50fa6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ma6o","text":"Hand-tight the butterfly screw of the N2 line to the inlet valve of the dewar.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1lmg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DEA4FA70FA1311ED8B8183A2A08BEE7A","height":204,"id":378637,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Asset 9.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2rb3twp.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2pb3twp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2qb3twp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2nb3twp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58qs1","text":"Open the inlet and the outlet valve of the dewar.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50s1r","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9nftl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"381C6BB0FA1411ED8B8183A2A08BEE7A","height":412,"id":378641,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/jpeg","original_name":"IMG_20230516_101938.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2vb3twp.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2tb3twp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2ub3twp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2sb3twp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d45ca","text":"Screw the N2 line to the dewar. Hand-tight the N2 line by using two wrenches. Do not over-tight the bolts.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5r7co","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1i483","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B5844E00F0BF11ED9A02C101C16BC79B","height":412,"id":378645,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"bi6d0\",\"text\":\"Screw the N2 line to the dewar.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Asset 2.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2zb3twp.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2xb3twp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2yb3twp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt2wb3twp.webp","width":550}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"s2hj","text":"Open the inlet valve of the dewar.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dr0el","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cg1vo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E0995B80F0BF11ED9A02C101C16BC79B","height":412,"id":378649,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"339l8\",\"text\":\"\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Asset 4.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt25b3twp.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt23b3twp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt24b3twp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt22b3twp.webp","width":550}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"css6b","text":"Switch on the cryomiller.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4bm8c","text":"Have you already used the cryomiller?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: Quick and dirty - First time user
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1roe6","text":"I have never milled my samples before and I have no idea of which parameters to use. Firstly, I want to get an idea of how the milling process works on my samples and then I will optimize my protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: Experienced user
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8hds5","text":"I have milled my samples before and I know which protocol to use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ucq","text":"If you already have an established milling protocol, you can save the parameters in a free memory bank (for example P3, in the picture).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":116,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4260n","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"chc53","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D5BF5040F0C211ED9A02C101C16BC79B","height":212,"id":378653,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Asset 7.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt29b3twp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt27b3twp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt28b3twp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt26b3twp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fq7v6","text":"The milling jar volume is 50 mL. The sample to be milled should occupy maximum about 1/3 of the total jar volume. For efficient milling, have between 10 mL and 20 mL of sample ready to be loaded in the milling jar.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhvdl","text":"If your material can be prepared in smaller pieces, cut it or break it to facilitate the milling process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bsr5","text":"Example: Materials like paper, plastic films, and hydrogels can be cut into small pieces by scissors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"762ld","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6uiuc","text":"Rule of thumb: use a milling ball whose diameter is about 3x the size of the biggest particle composing your sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8a26","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dh8oq","text":"Set the main switch (red) to 1. Then, press the green button. The green button lights up and the line of the N2 reservoir is now open.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":134,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bk1vb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"77F0C0B0FA1411ED8B8183A2A08BEE7A","height":203,"id":378657,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Asset 10.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3db3twp.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3bb3twp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3cb3twp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3ab3twp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cnnm1","text":"Turn the tap counterclockwise to start filling up the dewar. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"i1sh","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a2knh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"207F6330FA1511ED8B8183A2A08BEE7A","height":411,"id":378661,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Asset 13.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3hb3twp.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3fb3twp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3gb3twp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3eb3twp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"31q88","text":"Monitor the dewar as it get refilled. The dewar is full when you see some liquid nitrogen coming out of the outlet valve of the dewar (see video).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fb3dh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e5fr5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"video","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"752E9E00FA1511ED8B8183A2A08BEE7A","height":0,"id":375273,"is_video":true,"legend":"","mime":"video/mp4","original_name":"Tank_filled.mp4","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mqrkb3twp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mqrjb3twp.mp4","type":3,"width":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"26n4e","text":"Put on your cryogenic gloves. When the dewar is full, close the tap. Then, close the inlet and the outlet valve of the dewar.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"idnd","text":"Unscrew the butterfly screw from the dewar. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6nful","text":"Build up pressure inside the dewar by slowly opening the pressure build-up valve. Let the pressure rise to 1 bar, then close the pressure build-up valve. Wait for the pressure to drop below 0.5 bar (~ 10 seconds). Then, slowly open again the pressure build-up valve until you reach 1 bar. Repeat this process for 3 times until the pressure stabilizes around 1 bar.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":364,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dqj24","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B14950F0FA1611ED8B8183A2A08BEE7A","height":412,"id":378665,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Asset 17.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3mb3twp.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3jb3twp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3kb3twp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3ib3twp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fo0eq","text":"To fill the milling jar, follow the rule of thumb: 1/3 of the volume filled with the sample, 1/3 of milling balls, 1/3 of free space. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ch63","text":"To run a quick and dirty test, use the \"--\" program: this is a blank memory slot that allows you to try a quick test without saving the milling parameters.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":38,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al4de","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9q70e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"04423E50FA1911ED8B8183A2A08BEE7A","height":261,"id":378669,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Asset 6.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3rb3twp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3pb3twp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3qb3twp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mt3nb3twp.webp","width":550}}}}

title: Cryomiller SOP
